question: Which of the following archaeological sites has been declared as the cleanest iconic place in the country under the Adarsh Smarak Abhiyan?
explanation: Under the Adarsh Smarak Abhiyan, the ASI has ranked top 25 Adarsh Monuments on the basis of Cleanliness parameters such as amenities like toilets, green lawns, Polythene Free Zone, signage for awareness, disabilities access, drinking water and provision for garbage bins etc. “Rani ki Vav (Gujarat)”, a UNESCO World Heritage Site has been declared as the cleanest iconic place in the country.
